ai-mil7.8.5:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the two factors for one of them?”
ai-mil7.8.5:1.2_0: “Great king, why do you not stay in the same way?
ai-mil7.8.5:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator who is like the oppressive repulsion about the defilements that should not be tired.
ai-mil7.8.5:1.4_0: This is the first kind of deer.
ai-mil7.8.5:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the milk discarderates all was seen, drunk, and put into it.
ai-mil7.8.5:2.2_0: In the same way, although you may all call you conflict with the vanity of greed, hate, and delusion
ai-mil7.8.5:2.3_0: This is the second way to get hold of a companion.
ai-mil7.8.5:2.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.8.5:3.3_0: This too is why I must be attained.
ai-mil7.8.5:4.1_0: The fifth enquiry is the fifth thing.
